        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action, label, value) {
            try {
                ga('send', 'event', category, action, label, value);
            }
            catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                document.location.href = link.href;
            }, 100);
        } 
    </script>

        <script id="EktronScriptBlockagojk" type="text/javascript">

Ektron.ready(function(event, eventName){

                $ektron(".ux-app-siteApppageBuilder-setSizeTemplate .ui-dialog-buttonpane a").button();
                $ektron(".ux-app-siteApppageBuilder-setSizeTemplate .framework").accordion({
                    heightStyle: "content",
                    activate: function(event, ui){
                        $ektron(ui).closest(".ui-accordion").accordion("refresh");
                    }
                });
                $ektron(".ux-app-siteApppageBuilder-setSizeTemplate").draggable({ handle: "div.ui-dialog-titlebar ", containment: $ektron("body") });
            
});


</script>

                        <h3 style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif;">Resource Helps Employers Get the Most From On-Campus Recruiting</h3>          </a>                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                    <p style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif; line-height: 1.4em;">Jeff Brzozowski and Suzanne Helbig collaborated to create a worksheet for recruiting organizations and colleges to use together to leverage career center resources and improve recruiting outcomes.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                          
                    <p>

                        <h3 style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif;">Criteria for Selecting Target Schools</h3>          </a>          
                    <p style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif; line-height: 1.4em;">When selecting target schools for recruiting, employers rated majors offered, recruiting experience, quality of academic programs, and accreditation of school.</p>

                        <h3 style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif;">Cycle Times, Offer and Acceptance Rates</h3>          </a>                                                                                                                                                                                  
                    <p style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif; line-height: 1.4em;">While benchmarks associated with the hiring process have remained steady, there has been a continued decline in acceptance rate.</p>

                        <img alt="NACE"  style="height: 58px; width: auto; margin-top: 1.3em; margin-bottom: 0.7em;"  src="/uploadedImages/images/2017/logo/nace-logo-white.png" data-ektron-url="/uploadedImages/images/2017/logo/nace-logo-white.png"                                                /> </a> </div>            </div>-->                                                                                                                             
            <div class="row">                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                <div class="large-12 columns right-align">                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                    <a href="/center/">                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                
                        <img alt="NACE" style="height: 58px; width: auto; margin-top: 1.3em; margin-bottom: 0.7em;" src="/_assets/images/layout/nace-logo-white-horizontal.png"/> </a> </div>      </div>                                                                                                                                                     
            <div class="row">                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                <div class="large-12 columns  right-align">                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                    <a class="boxButtonInv semi-trans-fff" href="/center/">LEARN MORE ABOUT THE NACE CENTER</a> </div>      </div>                                                                                                                         
            <div class="row" style="margin-top: 2em;">                                                                                                                                                                 
                <div class="large-12 columns">                                                                                                                                                                                              
                    <a onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-slider-4-txt-head', 'click','22377');" href="/talent-acquisition/special-populations/partnerships-in-army-program-helps-ingalls-hire-veterans/" style="text-decoration:none;">                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                        <h3 style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif;">Partnerships in Army Program Help Ingalls Hire Veterans  </h3>          </a>                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                    <p style="font-family: &quot;open-sans&quot;,san-serif; line-height: 1.4em;">Through an Army program, Ingalls Shipbuilding established partnerships with military bases and community colleges to help provide skills training and job opportunities for veterans.</p>                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                          
                    <p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        <a onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-slider-4-btn', 'click','22377');" href="/talent-acquisition/special-populations/partnerships-in-army-program-helps-ingalls-hire-veterans/" class="boxButtonInv semi-trans-fff">Read More</a> </p>        </div>      </div>    </div>  </div>                                               
    <!-- /Rotating Banner Content --> </div>                    
                <br style="clear:both"/>
            </li>
        </ul>

                <div id="ctl00_contentPlaceHolder_firstRowArticleDrop_uxDropZone" data-ux-pagebuilder="DropZone">

                                            <li>
                                                
        <div id="ctl00_contentPlaceHolder_firstRowArticleDrop_uxColumnDisplay_ctl00_uxControlColumn_ctl00_uxWidgetHost_uxUpdatePanel">
		
                <div data-ux-pagebuilder="Widget">
                    
                    <div class="widgetBody">
                        
		<div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="/career-readiness/competencies/are-college-graduates-career-ready/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-1', 'click','22326');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">Career Readiness</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2018/feature/are-college-graduates-career-ready.jpg'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">Are College Graduates Career Ready?</h1><div class="date">February 19, 2018</div><div class="by">By NACE Staff</div><article><div>When it comes to rating the career readiness of college graduates, there are differences in perception between students and employers. <a href="/career-readiness/competencies/are-college-graduates-career-ready/ " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-1', 'click','22326');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div><div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="/job-market/internships/unpaid-internships-and-the-career-success-of-liberal-arts-graduates/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-2', 'click','22286');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">Job Market</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2018/journal/02/unpaid-internships-and-the-career-success-of-liberal-arts-graduates-3-961x600.jpg?n=1289'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">Unpaid Internships and the Career Success of Liberal Arts Graduates</h1><div class="date">February 01, 2018</div><div class="by">By Desalina Guarise and James Kostenblatt</div><article><div>This article provides highlights from the authors study, The Impact of Unpaid Internships on the Career Success of Liberal Arts Graduates. <a href="/job-market/internships/unpaid-internships-and-the-career-success-of-liberal-arts-graduates/ " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-2', 'click','22286');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div><div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="/talent-acquisition/trends-and-predictions/challenges-of-recruiting-for-data-analytics-cybersecurity/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-3', 'click','22379');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">Talent Acquisition</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2018/feature/challenges-of-recruiting-for-data-analytics-cybersecurity.jpg'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">Challenges of Recruiting for Data Analytics, Cybersecurity</h1><div class="date">March 05, 2018</div><div class="by">By NACE Staff</div><article><div>URR professionals see the lack of competitive compensation as the biggest deterrent to effectively recruiting talent in data analytics and cybersecurity. <a href="/talent-acquisition/trends-and-predictions/challenges-of-recruiting-for-data-analytics-cybersecurity/ " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-3', 'click','22379');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div>

    <!-- Second Row of Articles -->
    <div class="row newsHome_main">
        
        <div id="ctl00_contentPlaceHolder_secondRowArticleDrop_uxUpdatePanel" class="">
	
                <div id="ctl00_contentPlaceHolder_secondRowArticleDrop_uxDropZone" data-ux-pagebuilder="DropZone">

                                            <li>
                                                
        <div id="ctl00_contentPlaceHolder_secondRowArticleDrop_uxColumnDisplay_ctl00_uxControlColumn_ctl00_uxWidgetHost_uxUpdatePanel">
		
                <div data-ux-pagebuilder="Widget">
                    
                    <div class="widgetBody">
                        
		<div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="/career-development/organizational-structure/rutgersworks-an-update-on-the-industry-centric-career-cluster-model/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-4', 'click','22304');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">Career Development</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2018/journal/02/rutgersworks-an-update-on-the-industry-centric-career-cluster-model-1-961x600.jpg?n=7922'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">#RUTGERSWORKS: An Update on the Industry-Centric Career Cluster Model</h1><div class="date">February 01, 2018</div><div class="by">By William Jones and Jennifer Broyles</div><article><div>Five years ago, Rutgers University  New Brunswick adopted the career cluster model. How is it working? How has it evolved? <a href="/career-development/organizational-structure/rutgersworks-an-update-on-the-industry-centric-career-cluster-model/ " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-4', 'click','22304');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div><div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="/public-policy-and-legal/legal-issues/restrictive-covenants-noncompete-nonsolicitation-nondisclosure-agreements/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-5', 'click','22283');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">Public Policy & Legal</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2018/journal/02/restrictive-covenants-noncompete-nonsolicitation-nondisclosure-agreements-3-961x600.jpg?n=8449'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">Restrictive Covenants: Noncompete, Nonsolicitation, Nondisclosure Agreements</h1><div class="date">February 01, 2018</div><div class="by">By George C. Hlavac, Esq., and Edward J. Easterly, Esq.</div><article><div>Employers may require new hires and interns to sign restrictive covenants, such as noncompete, nonsolicitation, and/or nondisclosure agreements. Attorneys George Hlavac and Ed Easterly discuss the issues. <a href="/public-policy-and-legal/legal-issues/restrictive-covenants-noncompete-nonsolicitation-nondisclosure-agreements/ " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-5', 'click','22283');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div><div class="large-4 medium-4 columns naceArticle"><a class="article-link" href="http://community.naceweb.org/blogs/diane-safer/2018/03/13/creating-a-well-rounded-office-soft-skills-for-car" target="_blank" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-6', 'click','nace-community');"><div class="flagBox"><i class="flap"></i><i class="flag">NACE Community & Blog</i></div><div class="articleImg" style="background-image: url('/uploadedImages/images/2017/community/community-card.jpg'); background-size:cover; background-position:top center;"></div><h1 class="">Soft Skills for Career Counselors</h1><article><div>As career counselors, the leap to consider someone without the typical experience shouldnt be a long leap. <a href="http://community.naceweb.org/blogs/diane-safer/2018/03/13/creating-a-well-rounded-office-soft-skills-for-car " onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'home-card-6', 'click','nace-community');"><span class="readMore" name="Click to read more">Read more.</span></a></div></article></a></div>
